trans-unit.source: Represents base functionality common to all supported manifest types.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basere funksjonalitet som er felles for alle støttede manifest typene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir identiteten til manifestet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"></xref> object representing the identity of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"> </xref> -objekt som representerer identiteten til manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of assemblies that the manifest references.
trans-unit.target: Henter settet med samlingene manifestet refererer til.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReferenceCollection"></xref> object representing the set of assemblies that the manifest references.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReferenceCollection"> </xref> -objekt som representerer settet med samlingene manifestet refererer til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a textual description for the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en beskrivelse for manifestet.

trans-unit.source: A string describing the manifest.
trans-unit.target: En streng som beskriver manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an assembly reference that is the entry point of the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samlingsreferansen som inngangspunktet for applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference"></xref> object representing an assembly reference that is the entry point of the application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyReference"> </xref> -objekt som representerer en samlingsreferansen som inngangspunktet for applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of files that the manifest references.
trans-unit.target: Henter settet med filer som refererer til manifestet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReferenceCollection"></xref> object representing the set of files that the manifest references.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReferenceCollection"> </xref> -objekt som representerer antall filer som refererer til manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input stream from which the manifest was read.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den inngående dataflyten som manifestet ble lest.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter> uses this property to reconstitute input that is not represented in the object representation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter>bruker denne egenskapen til reconstitute inndata som ikke er representert i objekt-representasjon.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object representing the input stream from which the manifest was read.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>-objekt som representerer den inngående dataflyten som manifestet ble lest.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of current error and warning messages.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av gjeldende feil og advarsler.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection"></xref> object, which contains a collection of current error and warning messages.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection"> </xref> -objektet som inneholder en samling av gjeldende feil og advarsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the manifest is operating in read-only or read-write mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om manifestet opererer i skrivebeskyttet eller skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: If you only need to read a manifest, set this flag to `True`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger bare å lese et manifest, angir dette flagget `True`.

trans-unit.source: If you need to write a new manifest, set this flag to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger å skrive en ny manifest, angir dette flagget `False`.

trans-unit.source: The default is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Standard `False`.

trans-unit.source: This property provides additional context for the manifest generator, and affects how some error messages are reported.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gir ytterligere kontekst manifest generatoren og påvirker hvordan noen feilmeldinger rapporteres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether the manifest is operating in read-only or read-write mode.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir om manifestet opererer i skrivebeskyttet eller skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: Locates all specified assembly and file references by searching in the same directory as the loaded manifest, or in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: Finner alle angitte samlingen og fil referanser ved å søke i samme mappe som lastes inn manifestet eller i gjeldende mappe.

trans-unit.source: The location of each referenced assembly and file is required for hash computation and assembly identity resolution.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av hver referert til samlingen og filen er nødvendig for å kunne hash beregning og Samlingsfiler identitet løses.

trans-unit.source: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende feil eller advarsler rapporteres i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>objektet.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>

trans-unit.source: Locates all specified assembly and file references by searching in the specified directories.
trans-unit.target: Finner alle angitte samlingen og filreferanser ved å søke i den angitte katalogen.

trans-unit.source: The location of each referenced assembly and file is required for hash computation and assembly identity resolution.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av hver referert til samlingen og filen er nødvendig for å kunne hash beregning og Samlingsfiler identitet løses.

trans-unit.source: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende feil eller advarsler rapporteres i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>objektet.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>

trans-unit.source: An array of strings specifying the directories to search.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av strenger for å angi mapper til å søke.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location where the manifest was loaded or saved.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen der manifestet ble lastet inn eller lagret.

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the location where the manifest was loaded or saved.
trans-unit.target: En tekststreng som angir plasseringen der manifestet ble lastet inn eller lagret.

trans-unit.source: Returns the manifest name.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer navnet på manifest.

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the name of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: En tekststreng som angir navnet på manifestfilen.

trans-unit.source: Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer Filinformasjon for hver henviste samlingen og fil.

trans-unit.source: The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly.
trans-unit.target: Filinformasjonen inneholder en hash-beregning og en størrelse for hver referert fil- og Samlingsfiler.

trans-unit.source: Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity.
trans-unit.target: Samlingsidentiteten hentes også for alle refererte samlingene med en uspesifisert samlingsidentitet.

trans-unit.source: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende feil eller advarsler rapporteres i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>objektet.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>

trans-unit.source: Updates file information for each referenced assembly and file, using the specified version of the target framework.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer Filinformasjon for hver henviste samlingen og filen ved hjelp av den angitte versjonen av målet framework.

trans-unit.source: The file information includes a hash computation and a file size for each referenced file and assembly.
trans-unit.target: Filinformasjonen inneholder en hash-beregning og en størrelse for hver referert fil- og Samlingsfiler.

trans-unit.source: Also, the assembly identity is obtained for any referenced assemblies with an unspecified assembly identity.
trans-unit.target: Samlingsidentiteten hentes også for alle refererte samlingene med en uspesifisert samlingsidentitet.

trans-unit.source: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende feil eller advarsler rapporteres i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>objektet.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>

trans-unit.source: The version of the target framework to use.
trans-unit.target: Versjonen av målet framework skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: Null if no target framework version.
trans-unit.target: Null hvis ingen Målversjon framework.

trans-unit.source: If no target framework version, uses sha256 algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen Målversjon framework bruker sha256 algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Utfører forskjellige kontroller for å bekrefte gyldigheten av manifestet.

trans-unit.source: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende feil eller advarsler rapporteres i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>objektet.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>

trans-unit.source: Validates the manifest platform.
trans-unit.target: Validerer manifest plattformen.

trans-unit.source: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Resulterende feil eller advarsler rapporteres i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>objektet.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.OutputMessageCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.AssemblyIdentity*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egenskap som brukes til å serialisere den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.AssemblyIdentity*>egenskapen til en XML-fil.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.AssemblyIdentity*>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the identify of an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som angir identiteten til en samling.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.AssemblyReferences*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egenskap som brukes til å serialisere den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.AssemblyReferences*>egenskapen til en XML-fil.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.AssemblyReferences*>

trans-unit.source: An array of manifest assembly references.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med manifest Samlingsreferanser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.Description*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egenskap som brukes til å serialisere den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.Description*>egenskapen til en XML-fil.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.Description*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.FileReferences*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egenskap som brukes til å serialisere den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.FileReferences*>egenskapen til en XML-fil.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.FileReferences*>

trans-unit.source: An array of manifest file reference objects.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av manifestfilen referanse objekter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the schema to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egenskap som brukes til å serialisere skjemaet til en XML-fil.

trans-unit.source: The schema to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaet til en XML-fil.
